name: PaymentAdjustmentInformation
title: paymentAdjustmentInformation
description: Code system of concepts specifying any payment adjustment due to drugs or medical devices.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the GP2 segment.

concepts.display: Designated current drug or biological payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator G)
Designated new device payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator H)
Designated new drug or new biological payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator J)
Deductible not applicable (specific list of HCPCS codes)
